subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After poor results with free agency last year, the Jacksonville Jaguars vowed to revamp their aging roster through the draft. They made an exception for the three-time Pro Bowl left tackle Tra Thomas, who signed a three-year contract Monday, filling the team’s most glaring need. Thomas, 34, who allowed just two sacks in 658 pass attempts last season with Philadelphia, is expected to step into a starting role in place of the free agent Khalif Barnes and provide leadership on a team that finished 5-11 last season, then parted ways with three captains. Thomas missed eight games in 11 seasons with the Eagles. jags ¶Authorities said the girlfriend of Tampa Bay linebacker Geno Hayes stabbed him in the head and in the neck. A Hillsborough County Sheriff’s spokeswoman said Hayes was taken to a hospital by a friend Saturday. Hayes, 21, was treated and released. Deputies arrested 19-year-old Shevelle Bagley on Saturday afternoon. The sheriff’s spokeswoman says Hayes and Bagley got into an argument, which led to Bagley grabbing a pair of scissors and stabbing Hayes in the head. He managed to get the scissors away from her, but authorities say she then grabbed a knife and stabbed him in the neck. Bagley was charged with aggravated battery with a deadly weapon. stab (AP).
